participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

ascq_section_q01.Description: Cigarettes help with concentration. | 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Always; 0 = Uncertain / tlfb_tob_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_tob_l   == '1'

ascq_section_q02.Description: When someone is sad, smoking helps them feel better. | 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Always; 0 = Uncertain / tlfb_tob_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_tob_l   == '1'

ascq_section_q03.Description: The look and feel of a cigarette in the mouth is good. | 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Always; 0 = Uncertain / tlfb_tob_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_tob_l   == '1'

ascq_section_q04.Description: Parties are more enjoyable when a person is smoking. | 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Always; 0 = Uncertain / tlfb_tob_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_tob_l   == '1'

ascq_section_q05.Description: Smoking will make a person cough. | 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Always; 0 = Uncertain / tlfb_tob_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_tob_l   == '1'

ascq_section_q06.Description: Smoking makes people look ridiculous or silly. | 1 = Never; 2 = Rarely; 3 = Sometimes; 4 = Often; 5 = Always; 0 = Uncertain / tlfb_tob_c_l   == '1' ||  tlfb_tob_l   == '1'

su_nic_admin.Description: Please indicate how instrument was administered: | 1=RA-Administered ; 2=Youth Self_Administered ; 3=Combination [sched_delay] = '7'

ascq_positive_expectanciesv1nt.Description: Total number of items | Total number of items

ascq_positive_expectanciesv1nm.Description: Number of items with missing values | Number of items with missing values

ascq_positive_expectanciesv1ss.Description: Strength of positive expectancies for tobacco/smoking. Score prorated if some item responses were missing. | Sum of [ascq_section_q01_R1, ascq_section_q02_R1, ascq_section_q03_R1, ascq_section_q04_R1]

ascq_positive_expectanciesv2nt.Description: Total number of items | Total number of items

ascq_positive_expectanciesv2nm.Description: Number of items with missing values | Number of items with missing values

ascq_positive_expectanciesv2ss.Description: Strength of positive expectancies for tobacco/smoking. Score prorated if some item responses were missing. NOTE: response values of ''uncertain'' were recoded to the lowest response option, ''never'', for computing this score. | Sum of [ascq_section_q01_R2, ascq_section_q02_R2, ascq_section_q03_R2, ascq_section_q04_R2]

ascq_negative_expectanciesv1nt.Description: Total number of items | Total number of items

ascq_negative_expectanciesv1nm.Description: Number of items with missing values | Number of items with missing values

ascq_negative_expectanciesv1ss.Description: Strength of negative expectancies for tobacco/smoking. Score prorated if some item responses were missing. | Sum of [ascq05_R1, ascq06_R1]

ascq_negative_expectanciesv2nt.Description: Total number of items | Total number of items

ascq_negative_expectanciesv2nm.Description: Number of items with missing values | Number of items with missing values

ascq_negative_expectanciesv2ss.Description: Strength of negative expectancies for tobacco/smoking. Score prorated if some item responses were missing. NOTE: response values of ''uncertain'' were recoded to the lowest response option, ''never'', for computing this score. | Sum of [ascq05_R2, ascq06_R2]
